# ChangeLog

## v4.1.0
* Upgraded Geo services to v3

## v4.0.9
* Updated sandbox endpoint

## v4.0.7
* Platform version keeper: Upgrading module dependencies

## v4.0.6
* Fixed deprecation message

## v4.0.5
* Changed Staging endpoints to VIP

## v4.0.4
* Removed explicitly defined discovery instrument

## v4.0.3
* Added urn for service-discovery

## v4.0.2
* Fixed Service Client warn message

## v4.0.1
* Upgraded Geo services to v2

## v4.0.0
* Remove peer and unwanted dependencies and upgrade dependencies

## v0.1.11
* Upgraded `service-client-ebay` to 1.x

## v0.1.10
* Added Sandbox URL

## v0.1.9
* Removed unused dependencies

## v0.1.8
* Cleaned up dependencies

## v0.1.7
* Fixed: Enabled to include service visibility from Validate Internals, This would provide config, Markup/down capabilities

## v0.1.6
* Fixed: should cache geo per country for 1 hour. The fix improves performance of nodejs web stack.
